children.name: according
children.sourceText: And it shall come to pass that their cry shall go, even according to the simpleness of their words.

children.name: a
children.sourceText: A seer shall the Lord my God raise up, who shall be a choice seer unto the fruit of my loins.

children.name: after
children.sourceText: Behold, I am sure of the fulfilling of this promise; And his name shall be called after me; and it shall be after the name of his father.

children.name: all
children.sourceText: And out of weakness he shall be made strong, in that day when my work shall commence among all my people, unto the restoring thee, O house of Israel, saith the Lord.

children.name: among
children.sourceText: A choice seer will I raise up out of the fruit of thy loins; and he shall be esteemed highly among the fruit of thy loins.

children.name: and
children.sourceText: A choice seer will I raise up out of the fruit of thy loins; and he shall be esteemed highly among the fruit of thy loins.

children.name: as
children.sourceText: I am sure of this thing, even as I am sure of the promise of Moses; for the Lord hath said unto me, I will preserve thy seed forever.

children.name: because
children.sourceText: Because of their faith their words shall proceed forth out of my mouth unto their brethren who are the fruit of thy loins; and the weakness of their words will I make strong in their faith, unto the remembering of my covenant which I made unto thy fathers.

children.name: but
children.sourceText: But a seer will I raise up out of the fruit of thy loins; and unto him will I give power to bring forth my word unto the seed of thy loins, and not to the bringing forth my word only, saith the Lord, but to the convincing them of my word, which shall have already gone forth among them.

children.name: by
children.sourceText: Wherefore, the fruit of thy loins shall write; and the fruit of the loins of Judah shall write; and that which shall be written by the fruit of thy loins, and also that which shall be written by the fruit of the loins of Judah, shall grow together, unto the confounding of false doctrines and laying down of contentions, and establishing peace among the fruit of thy loins, and bringing them to the knowledge of their fathers in the latter days, and also to the knowledge of my covenants, saith the Lord.

children.name: down
children.sourceText: Wherefore, the fruit of thy loins shall write; and the fruit of the loins of Judah shall write; and that which shall be written by the fruit of thy loins, and also that which shall be written by the fruit of the loins of Judah, shall grow together, unto the confounding of false doctrines and laying down of contentions, and establishing peace among the fruit of thy loins, and bringing them to the knowledge of their fathers in the latter days, and also to the knowledge of my covenants, saith the Lord.

children.name: for
children.sourceText: And unto him will I give commandment that he shall do a work for the fruit of thy loins, his brethren, which shall be of great worth unto them, even to the bringing of them to the knowledge of the covenants which I have made with thy fathers.

children.name: from
children.sourceText: And it shall be as if the fruit of thy loins had cried unto them from the dust; for I know their faith.

children.name: he
children.sourceText: A choice seer will I raise up out of the fruit of thy loins; and he shall be esteemed highly among the fruit of thy loins.

children.name: him
children.sourceText: And unto him will I give commandment that he shall do a work for the fruit of thy loins, his brethren, which shall be of great worth unto them, even to the bringing of them to the knowledge of the covenants which I have made with thy fathers.

children.name: his
children.sourceText: And unto him will I give commandment that he shall do a work for the fruit of thy loins, his brethren, which shall be of great worth unto them, even to the bringing of them to the knowledge of the covenants which I have made with thy fathers.

children.name: I
children.sourceText: A choice seer will I raise up out of the fruit of thy loins; and he shall be esteemed highly among the fruit of thy loins.

children.name: if
children.sourceText: And it shall be as if the fruit of thy loins had cried unto them from the dust; for I know their faith.

children.name: in
children.sourceText: And I will make him great in mine eyes; for he shall do my work.

children.name: it
children.sourceText: Behold, I am sure of the fulfilling of this promise; And his name shall be called after me; and it shall be after the name of his father.

children.name: like
children.sourceText: And he shall be great like unto Moses, whom I have said I would raise up unto you, to deliver my people, O house of Israel.

children.name: many
children.sourceText: And they shall cry from the dust; yea, even repentance unto their brethren, even after many generations have gone by them.

children.name: me
children.sourceText: Thus saith the Lord unto me:

children.name: mine
children.sourceText: And I will make him great in mine eyes; for he shall do my work.

children.name: my
children.sourceText: A seer shall the Lord my God raise up, who shall be a choice seer unto the fruit of my loins.

children.name: none
children.sourceText: And I will give unto him a commandment that he shall do none other work, save the work which I shall command him.

children.name: o
children.sourceText: And he shall be great like unto Moses, whom I have said I would raise up unto you, to deliver my people, O house of Israel.

children.name: of
children.sourceText: A seer shall the Lord my God raise up, who shall be a choice seer unto the fruit of my loins.

children.name: other
children.sourceText: And I will give unto him a commandment that he shall do none other work, save the work which I shall command him.

children.name: out
children.sourceText: A choice seer will I raise up out of the fruit of thy loins; and he shall be esteemed highly among the fruit of thy loins.

children.name: save
children.sourceText: And I will give unto him a commandment that he shall do none other work, save the work which I shall command him.

children.name: shall
children.sourceText: A seer shall the Lord my God raise up, who shall be a choice seer unto the fruit of my loins.

children.name: should
children.sourceText: And the words which he shall write shall be the words which are expedient in my wisdom should go forth unto the fruit of thy loins.

children.name: that
children.sourceText: And unto him will I give commandment that he shall do a work for the fruit of thy loins, his brethren, which shall be of great worth unto them, even to the bringing of them to the knowledge of the covenants which I have made with thy fathers.

children.name: the
children.sourceText: A seer shall the Lord my God raise up, who shall be a choice seer unto the fruit of my loins.

children.name: thee
children.sourceText: And out of weakness he shall be made strong, in that day when my work shall commence among all my people, unto the restoring thee, O house of Israel, saith the Lord.

children.name: their
children.sourceText: Wherefore, the fruit of thy loins shall write; and the fruit of the loins of Judah shall write; and that which shall be written by the fruit of thy loins, and also that which shall be written by the fruit of the loins of Judah, shall grow together, unto the confounding of false doctrines and laying down of contentions, and establishing peace among the fruit of thy loins, and bringing them to the knowledge of their fathers in the latter days, and also to the knowledge of my covenants, saith the Lord.

children.name: them
children.sourceText: And unto him will I give commandment that he shall do a work for the fruit of thy loins, his brethren, which shall be of great worth unto them, even to the bringing of them to the knowledge of the covenants which I have made with thy fathers.

children.name: they
children.sourceText: Behold, that seer will the Lord bless; and they that seek to destroy him shall be confounded; for this promise, which I have obtained of the Lord, of the fruit of my loins, shall be fulfilled.

children.name: this
children.sourceText: Behold, that seer will the Lord bless; and they that seek to destroy him shall be confounded; for this promise, which I have obtained of the Lord, of the fruit of my loins, shall be fulfilled.

children.name: thus
children.sourceText: Thus saith the Lord unto me:

children.name: thy
children.sourceText: A choice seer will I raise up out of the fruit of thy loins; and he shall be esteemed highly among the fruit of thy loins.

children.name: to
children.sourceText: And unto him will I give commandment that he shall do a work for the fruit of thy loins, his brethren, which shall be of great worth unto them, even to the bringing of them to the knowledge of the covenants which I have made with thy fathers.

children.name: unto
children.sourceText: A seer shall the Lord my God raise up, who shall be a choice seer unto the fruit of my loins.

children.name: up
children.sourceText: A seer shall the Lord my God raise up, who shall be a choice seer unto the fruit of my loins.

children.name: wherefore
children.sourceText: Wherefore, the fruit of thy loins shall write; and the fruit of the loins of Judah shall write; and that which shall be written by the fruit of thy loins, and also that which shall be written by the fruit of the loins of Judah, shall grow together, unto the confounding of false doctrines and laying down of contentions, and establishing peace among the fruit of thy loins, and bringing them to the knowledge of their fathers in the latter days, and also to the knowledge of my covenants, saith the Lord.

children.name: which
children.sourceText: And unto him will I give commandment that he shall do a work for the fruit of thy loins, his brethren, which shall be of great worth unto them, even to the bringing of them to the knowledge of the covenants which I have made with thy fathers.

children.name: who
children.sourceText: A seer shall the Lord my God raise up, who shall be a choice seer unto the fruit of my loins.

children.name: whom
children.sourceText: And he shall be great like unto Moses, whom I have said I would raise up unto you, to deliver my people, O house of Israel.

children.name: will
children.sourceText: A choice seer will I raise up out of the fruit of thy loins; and he shall be esteemed highly among the fruit of thy loins.

children.name: with
children.sourceText: And unto him will I give commandment that he shall do a work for the fruit of thy loins, his brethren, which shall be of great worth unto them, even to the bringing of them to the knowledge of the covenants which I have made with thy fathers.

children.name: would
children.sourceText: And he shall be great like unto Moses, whom I have said I would raise up unto you, to deliver my people, O house of Israel.

children.name: yea
children.sourceText: And they shall cry from the dust; yea, even repentance unto their brethren, even after many generations have gone by them.

children.name: yet
children.sourceText: Yet I will not loose his tongue, that he shall speak much, for I will not make him mighty in speaking.

children.name: you
children.sourceText: And he shall be great like unto Moses, whom I have said I would raise up unto you, to deliver my people, O house of Israel.
